fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock a player and steal their ability (Alive)
- Steal a player's memories (Dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After stealing an ability, you may use it the following night, and then you must steal a new ability. Attempting to steal a Killing ability will fail, but you will still roleblock your target
- When you steal a memory, you block all notifications from your target and their visitors
- Roleblock Immune
